mil7.7.3:1.1_0: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘cittakadharakummassa ekaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabban’ti yaṁ vadesi, katamaṁ taṁ ekaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabban”ti?
mil7.7.3:1.2_0: “Yathā, mahārāja, cittakadharakummo udakabhayā udakaṁ parivajjetvā vicarati, tāya ca pana udakaṁ parivajjanāya āyunā na parihāyati;
mil7.7.3:1.3_0: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena pamāde bhayadassāvinā bhavitabbaṁ, appamāde guṇavisesadassāvinā.
mil7.7.3:1.4_0: Tāya ca pana bhayadassāvitāya na parihāyati sāmaññā, nibbānassa santike upeti.
mil7.7.3:1.5_0: Idaṁ, mahārāja, cittakadharakummassa ekaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
